hanzi-su-wiki:
鳩

Значения

Голубь

Мнемоника

Птицы 鳥, живущие стаями (не менее девяти 九 особей), голуби.

Варианты

鸠

koohiiStory1: Feed one pigeon and nine more birds will be swarming you immediately…　RTK2:　On list of rare or no official Chinese reading.
koohiiStory2: Imagine some pigeons going to see a baseball game. They would surely be the only birds there!
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: There are nine birds and one of them is a dove and another is a pigeon. These nine birds are a flock of all kinds, but the dove and the pigeon are the leaders.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Look at these nine birds strutting down the street like they own the place. The dove and pigeon are out in front because they are the most important. Hear them chirping and fluttering their feathers about.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Take a look at the pigeon in front of you. Now, grab it, tear it in half, and grab the heart (はと) from its little body.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Devour it. You love pigeon hearts. Discard the rest, keep the heart.
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 鴻 (ひしくい、コウ гусь-гуменник).
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the nine (九) birds (鳥) are pigeons

鸠鸠 		pigeon, dove, collect, assemble
  • kind of bird 鳥 of which there are many 九
(Simplified: 鸠)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 九 indicates the sound; 鳥 (bird) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 九 [ jiǔ ] nine
    • 鳥 [ niǎo ] bird
①鳥，鳩鴿科部分種類的統稱：鳩形鵠面(形容人因飢餓而很瘦的樣子)。鳩杖(古代頭上刻有鳩形之杖，年始七十者，由政府授給)。
②聚集：鳩合(亦作“糾合”)。鳩集(亦作“糾集”)。

鳩字的基本解释

鳩
jiū
见“鸠”。

鳩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiū］
［《廣韻》居求切，平尤，見。］
“九2”的被通假字。“鸠1”的繁体字。
(1)鸟名。古为鸠鸽类，种类不一。如雉鸠、祝鸠、斑鸠等，亦有非鸠鸽类而以鸠名的如鸤鸠（布谷）。今为鸠鸽科部分鸟类的通称。常指山斑鸠及珠颈斑鸠两种。
(2)聚集；收集；集合。
(3)安定。
(4)古井田制九夫之地。《左传·襄公二十五年》：“蔿掩書土田，度山林，鳩藪澤。”孔颖达疏引贾逵曰：“藪澤之地，九夫爲鳩，八鸠而當一井也。”一说为度量，计算。
(5)穴位名。
(6)一种行于沙地的运载工具。
[②]［zhì］
［《集韻》丈尒切，上紙，澄。］
“鸠2”的繁体字。通“豸1”。
解决。

鳩字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鳩； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1481第10
【唐韻】居求切【集韻】【正韻】居尤切，?九平聲。【說文】鶻鵃。似山雀而小，短尾，靑黑色。【禽經】拙者莫如鳩，不能爲巢。【詩·召南】維鵲有巢，維鳩居之。【禮·月令】仲春，鷹化爲鳩。又【王制】鳩化爲鷹，然後設罻羅。【註】仲秋也。又官名。【左傳·昭十七年】郯子曰：少皞氏以鳥名官，祝鳩氏，司徒也。鴡鳩氏，司馬也。鳲鳩氏，司空也。爽鳩氏，司?也。鶻鳩氏，司事也。五鳩，鳩民者也。【嚴粲詩緝】左傳五鳩備見詩經。祝鳩，鵓鳩也，四牡嘉魚之鵻是也。鴡鳩，關關鴡鳩之鳩是也。鳲鳩，布穀也，曹風之鳲鳩是也。鷞鳩，大明之鷹是也。鶻鳩，鱟鳩，非《班鳩》《小宛》之鳴鳩，《氓》食桑葚之鳩是也。又蒙鳩，鷦鷯也。【荀子·勸學篇】南方有鳥，名曰蒙鳩。又【爾雅·釋詁】鳩，聚也。【正字通】鳩能聚陽氣，故取義於聚。【書·堯典】共工方鳩僝功。【左傳·襄二十五年】鳩藪澤。又安也，集也。【左傳·隱八年】君釋三國之圖，以鳩其民。又【襄十六年】敢使魯無鳩乎。又國名。【山海經】始鳩在海中轅厲南。又舒鳩

Dove
Basic explanation of words
Dove
jiū
See "Dove".
Dove
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiū］
["Guangyun" Ju Qiqi, Pingyou, see. ]
"Nine 2" was passed falsely. Traditional characters for "dove 1".
(1) The name of the bird. In ancient times, it was a dove and pigeons of different types. Such as pheasant dove, Zhu dove, turtle dove, etc., there are also non-dove pigeons but the name of the dove, such as the pigeon (cuckoo). Today it is the general term for some birds of the pigeon family. Often refers to two species of turtledoves and bead-necked turtledoves.
(2) Gather; collect; gather.
(3) Stability.
(4) The land of nine husbands in the ancient mine field. "The Twenty-five Years of Zuo Zhuan·Xiang Gong": "Yu covers the earth and fields, and travels to the mountains and forests, and the mountains and forests." ." One is measurement, calculation.
(5) The name of the acupuncture point.
(6) A vehicle that travels in the sand.
[②]［zhì］
["Jiyun" cut, put on paper, clear. ]
Traditional characters for "dove 2". Same as "豸1".
solve.
Dove
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　 Dove; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1481 No. 10
[Tang Yun] Ju Qiqie [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Ju Youqie,? Jiu Ping Sheng. [Said the text] falcon. It is small like a tit, short-tailed, and black. [Qin Jing] The clumsy is like a dove and cannot be a nest. [Poetry·Zhaonan] Wei magpie has a nest, and Wei Jiu lives in it. 【Rite·Month Order】In the middle of spring, the eagle turns into a dove. Also [king system] the dove turned into an eagle, and then set up a 罻罗. [Note] Zhong Qiu also. Also official name. [Zuo Zhuan·17th Year of Zhao] Tanzi said: The Shaohao clan is an official named after a bird, Zhu Jiu clan, and Situ also. Wei Jiu's family, Sima also. Yujiu's family, Sikong also. Shuangjiu, Secretary? Falcon Dove is also a secretary. Five doves, also dove people. [Yan Can Poems] Zuo Zhuan Wu Jiu prepared to see the Book of Songs. Zhu Jiu, 鹁鹁鹁, Simu Jiayu's 鵻 is also. The dove of the 鴡鴡, the dove of the Guanguan 鴡鴡 is also. Dianjiu, Cuckoo is also, Cao Fengzhi Dianjiu is also. Dove, Daming Eagle is also. The falcon dove and the horseshoe dove are not the Ming dove of "Banjiu" and "Xiaowan", but also the dove of "Mug" that eats mulberries. The dove again, and the wren too. 【Xunzi·Encouraging Learning】There are birds in the south, and the name is Mongolian Dove. Also 【Erya·Shi Xuan】Dove, get together. 【Zhengzitong】The dove can gather yang energy, so it takes the meaning to gather. [Book·Yao Dian] Gonggong Fang Jiupun Gong. [Twenty-five years of Zuo Zhuan·Xiang] Jiu Tauze. You An Ye, Ji Ye. [Zuo Zhuan·Hidden Eight Years] The king interprets the pictures of the Three Kingdoms and uses his people to dove. Also 【Xiang Sixteenth Year】Dare to make Lu Wujiu almost. Also the name of the country. [Shan Hai Jing] Shijiu was in the middle of the sea and Li Nan. Shujiu

jiū
вм. 鸠
Radicals: 九, 鳥  (nine, bird)
Meaning Mnemonic
There are nine birds and one of them is a dove and another is a pigeon. These nine birds are a flock of all kinds, but the dove and the pigeon are the leaders.
Look at these nine birds strutting down the street like they own the place. The dove and pigeon are out in front because they are the most important. Hear them chirping and fluttering their feathers about.
Reading Mnemonic
Take a look at the pigeon in front of you. Now, grab it, tear it in half, and grab the heart (はと) from its little body.
Devour it. You love pigeon hearts. Discard the rest, keep the heart.
